serving_heading: Let's select the best taste for your next coffee break!
first_taste_of_the_week_description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam
second_taste_of_the_week_description: Rich, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet milk sauce and steamed milk
coffee_description_order_screen: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup is marked with espresso and topped with caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.
